entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the morning then rising. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 15 in the morning then rising. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
